lead_paragraph: “Lynda Benglis: New Work,” at Cheim & Read, is dominated by wall sculptures whose fragments are at once bodylike, painterly and levitating in suggestion, but not in a particularly new way.
snippet: “Lynda Benglis: New Work,” at Cheim & Read, is dominated by wall sculptures whose fragments are at once bodylike, painterly and levitating in suggestion, but not in a particularly new way.

headline.main: Polyurethane and Color Punctuate a Long Career
headline.seo: Polyurethane and Color in a Long Career, at Cheim & Read
headline.print_headline: Polyurethane and Color Punctuate a Long Career
